results.name: Number T(n,k) of set partitions of [n] such that the maximal absolute difference between the least elements of consecutive blocks equals k; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=max(n-1,0), read by rows.
comment: The maximal absolute difference is assumed to be zero if there are fewer than two blocks.
T(n,k) is defined for all n,k >= 0.  The triangle contains only the positive terms. T(n,k) = 0 if k>=n and k>0.
